palette.title: Luna Folds Five*
palette.description: Luna Rosa - my user name is the name of my beautiful black labrador, who we adopted as a puppy around the same time I joined colourlovers. Impossible Things - a Doctor Who reference which represents my love of British sci-fi and general geekiness. Sleepless Dragon - I've discovered two things since joining this site - a random love of dragon palettes and a whole lot of sleepless late hours:) Luna Azul - my favourite colour is blue (azul in Spanish, I learnt that too:) Zoom Out - one of my hobbies is photography, some of which you can see on my slightly neglected website. One of my other hobbies is daydreaming:) * Sneaky bonus fact - my love of American band Ben Folds Five.
